name: taskforge
description: This application, built with **Angular**, allows users to efficiently organize and manage their tasks. Users can view their tasks in a table format, making it easy to keep track of them. The app provides functionality to ***add***, ***edit***, and ***delete*** tasks, giving users full control over their task list. It uses **Angular Material** for its UI components, ensuring a clean with modern design elements. Additionally, ***Angular's routing*** is implemented to provide smooth navigation between different views, such as the task list and the forms for adding or editing tasks. This seamless user experience makes the app both functional and easy to use for everyday task management.
author: Joan-Thirmbu
